snippet: North Korea also rejected a similar offer from the South last year, calling it too small and dashing hopes of easing relations.
abstract: North Korea rejects a South Korean offer to send humanitarian aid, scuttling earlier hopes of easing tensions between the two Koreas.
lead_paragraph: North Korea also rejected a similar offer from the South last year, calling it too small and dashing hopes of easing relations.

headline.main: North Korea Rejects Offer of Aid From South Korea
headline.print_headline: North Korea Rejects Humanitarian Aid from South
